feat.value: Pages 129-134 transcribed in Paris by David Brakke, March 2010. Pages 135-136 transcribed from microfilm by Bentley Layton, Spring 2005; collated in Paris by David Brakke, March 2010. David Brakke and Andrew Crislip published a translation of Whoever Seeks God Will Find in their book Selected Discourses of Shenoute the Great (Cambridge University Press, 2015), pp. 114-117. Chapter divisions and numbering follow Brakke's divisions and numbering.
